title: Aural set, trio sonata - flute and violin melody

content.description:
Questions 23-27 are based on an excerpt of music that will be played four times. A diagram of the excerpt is provided below. Before listening to the music for the first time, please look at the diagram and read Questions 23‑27.

Courtesy of Naxos of America, Inc.
content.question: In relation to the opening flute melody, the violin melody is

choices.label: an imitation of the flute melody
an inversion of the flute melody
an augmentation of the flute melody
a diminution of the flute melody

content.answer: an imitation of the flute melody

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.G: Use terms and symbols to describe aspects of musical design in performed music, including texture, timbre, and instrumentation, and expressive elements, including dynamics, articulation, and tempo.
